summary: Diff modifies Landing page and two project metadata/text files. Landing.tsx appears to increase the carousel/container min-height and adds keyboard navigation logic, but evidence does not show a targeted style adjustment applied ONLY to the single inner card element identified by the provided XPath. Additional non-requested changes include edits to frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json, and keyboard navigation behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Increase the rendered height of the specific selected element in the “Why SweetSteps?” modal carousel (the element corresponding to the provided XPath) so text is not cut off, applying the change ONLY to that element and not altering surrounding carousel layout beyond what’s strictly necessary.
missing_requirements.reason: The available diff evidence indicates a change described as increasing the "carousel container height" via min-height classes, but does not show a targeted style adjustment limited to the single inner card element specified by XPath. This suggests the change may have been applied to a container/surrounding layout rather than exclusively to the identified element.

hallucinated_features.description: Keyboard navigation for the modal carousel (Escape to close, ArrowLeft/ArrowRight to navigate)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest focuses only on increasing the selected inner card’s height to prevent text clipping, and explicitly says not to add new features.

hallucinated_features.description: Edits to project metadata/state tracking (project_state.json) including new_feature_requests statuses
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; request is a frontend styling adjustment limited to a single element on the Landing page.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to frontend-file-summaries.txt content describing multiple unrelated app-wide changes
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; request scope is a single targeted frontend styling fix and constraints discourage unrelated modifications.
